This classic thriller follows a group of characters as they hunt down a killer shark that terrorizes a beach community off Cape Cod. The film stars Roy Scheider, Richard Dreyfuss, and Robert Shaw, delivering an exciting and suspenseful experience.

If you're interested in a more family-friendly adventure, "Little Lord Fauntleroy" (1886) could be a good fit. This timeless tale tells the story of an American boy who discovers he is the heir to a British fortune and moves to live with his cold and unsentimental relative, offering a heartwarming journey of self-discovery. The film features a star-studded cast including Freddie Bartholomew as Cedric Errol. Enjoy your movie time!
